title: Dubai ruler’s divorce settlement reveals ‘truly opulent’ standard of living
content:
1. Dubai ruler’s divorce settlement reveals ‘truly opulent’ standard of living  The Guardian
  2. Dubai ruler Sheikh Mohammed must pay record-breaking £500m divorce settlement to Princess Haya  BBC News
  3. Princess Paid Bodyguard $9M in Blackmail to Keep Their Affair Quiet, but Still Got Busted  The Daily Beast
  4. Dubai sheikh ordered to fund ex-wife's $700M protection from himself  Fox News
  5. Dubai ruler must provide $733 million to settle U.K. custody case  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
